documents.name: Terms of Service
documents.text:
Home

Terms of Service Prerequisite

ThisWebsiteWillSelfDestruct.com is for people over 13 years of age. If you do not meet that criteria, you may not use or submit content.

Rights

You can choose to remain anonymous. There is no signup, and the site should work fine if you chose to block 3rd party JavasScript, to disable all analytics.

You can request to remove personal content through the report feature, or by sending an email to Femme@FemmeAndroid.com with details about the message.

Your data will be backed up regularly, and the backups tested.

You will be treated with respect and discretion.

Responsibilities

You may not make automated requests to the site without prior approval.

You must not abuse the site by knowingly posting malicious code, or links to malicious sites, that could harm other users. If you find a security or privacy bug in ListenLater, I ask that you please report it to me right away by private email.

You may not use the site to harass other users.

documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Home

Privacy Policy

This policy applies to all information collected by or submitted to ThisWebsiteWillselfDestruct.com

We will not distribute your personal information to outside parties without your consent.

ThisWebsiteWillSelfdestruct.com only stores the content of your message, and no PII. We also collect information used for reporting, moderation, and likes. An IP address is kept for no longer than 30 days for the purpose of spam control.

Ads and tracking

We do not have any ads on the site, and do not use any third party analytics data.

Security

We implement a variety of security measures to help keep your information secure. For instance, all communication with the app and website require HTTPS. Passwords are hashed, not stored, using industry-standard methods.

Data Access, Changes, and Deletion

There are no accounts on ThisWebsiteWillSelfDestruct.com. If you have a message you wish to delete, please report the message with a comment. Deleted information may be kept in backups for short periods of time to facilitate disaster recovery.

ThisWebsiteWillselfDestruct.com may delete your information at any time, and for any reason, such as technical needs, legal concerns, abuse prevention, removal of idle accounts, data loss, or other reasons.

Information for foreign compliance

Information may be processed, stored, and used outside of the country in which you are located. Data privacy laws vary across jurisdictions, and different laws may be applicable to your data depending on where it is processed, stored, or used.

By using ThisWebsiteWillselfDestruct and providing your information, you authorize us to collect, use, and store your information outside of the European Union.

We never collect or maintain information at our website from those we actually know are under 13, and no part of our website is structured to attract anyone under 13.

The policy

By using ThisWebsiteWillselfDestruct.com, you consent to our privacy policy.

If you have questions regarding this privacy policy, please email privacy@thiswebsitewillselfdestruct.com.

If we decided to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page, along with a summary of changes.

Updates

July 8, 2020 - Clarified that we do not have ads or use analytics data.
